posts.content: Pro tip: Use React.memo() wisely!  Don't wrap every component - only use it when you have expensive renders or frequent re-renders. Measure first, optimize second.

comments.text: This! So many people overuse memo without measuring
Great advice! Premature optimization is the root of all evil
What tools do you recommend for measuring render performance?
React DevTools Profiler is your friend! üõ†Ô∏è
